issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.customfield_12310192: The fix for HDFS-11056 reads meta file to load last partial chunk checksum when a block is converted from finalized/temporary to rbw. However, it did not close the file explicitly, which may cause number of open files reaching system limit. This jira fixes it by closing the file explicitly after the meta file is read.

fields.summary: HDFS-11056 failed to close meta file

comments.body: Upload patch v001. Use try-with-resources statement to close the file.
Ha, I got you, in java 7,  "Any variable declared in the try block will automatically have close() called when the try block exits.", so your patch looks good to me now. Thanks.
+1 LGTM too. Please also set the targets versions in the future, since this looks like a 3.0.0-alpha2 blocker as well.
